examples: The teacher placed the books on the desk.
I placed the shiny red apple in the basket.
He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
My computer is placed on the desk in the office.
The bolt clicked into place.
words.defineEn: the part of space where someone or something is or they should be
words.defineVi: một phần của không gian nơi ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó hoặc họ nên được

examples: The compass needle always points north.
They went farther north into the mountains.
The north side of the building gets the most sunlight in the morning.
Many migratory birds fly south for the winter and return north in the spring.
The compass needle points to the north when you're facing south.
words.defineEn: the direction on our left when we watch the sunrise; the direction on the top of the map of the world
words.defineVi: hướng bên trái của chúng tôi khi chúng tôi xem mặt trời mọc; hướng trên bản đồ thế giới

examples: Many migratory birds fly south for the winter and return north in the spring.
The south of the country is known for its beautiful beaches.
The south of the city is more residential, while the north is more commercial.
They were both raised in the South.
Everyone in the gang went south when they learned that the police had discovered their hideout.
words.defineEn: the direction on our right when we watch the sunrise; the direction at the bottom of the map of the world
words.defineVi: hướng bên phải của chúng ta khi chúng ta ngắm bình minh; hướng ở dưới cùng của bản đồ thế giới

examples: The house looks east.
The east is known for its rich cultural heritage.
The sun always rises in the east.
The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
The wind is blowing from the east today.
words.defineEn: the direction from which the sun rises, which is on the right side of a person facing north
words.defineVi: hướng mà mặt trời mọc, nằm ở phía bên phải của một người quay mặt về hướng bắc

examples: The west is known for its stunning landscapes and breathtaking sunsets.
The west is often associated with notions of freedom and adventure.
The west is home to vast deserts, rolling plains, and majestic mountain ranges.
The sun rises in the east and sets in the west.
The west is where the day ends and the night begins.
words.defineEn: the direction towards which the sun goes down, which is on the left side of a person facing north
words.defineVi: hướng mặt trời lặn, nằm ở phía bên trái của một người hướng về phía bắc

examples: Election season always puts my dad's back up.
Dr. Jaffe pinned her ears back.
Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
I ran the tape back.
The enemy was driven back.
words.defineVi: theo hướng phía sau chúng tôi

examples: Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
That extension is busy right now.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
Right by holding the candle to the devil.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
words.defineEn: on or toward the right side
words.defineVi: trên hoặc về phía bên phải

examples: My mother throws that far away.
I've saved almost £100 so far.
The kangaroo can jump very far with its powerful hind legs.
The music was far too loud for my liking.
They went farther north into the mountains.
words.defineEn: to or at a great distance
words.defineVi: đến hoặc ở một khoảng cách lớn

examples: Ancient historians wrote of a lost continent beneath the ocean.
Antarctica is the coldest continent on Earth.
Africa is the second-largest continent in the world.
Australia is the only continent that is also a country.
Asia is the largest continent and is home to many ancient civilizations.
words.defineEn: any of the large land masses of the Earth surrounded by sea such as Europe, Africa or Asia
words.defineVi: bất kỳ vùng đất rộng lớn nào trên Trái đất được bao quanh bởi biển như Châu Âu, Châu Phi hoặc Châu Á

examples: Asia is home to various religions, including Buddhism, Hinduism, and Islam.
The Great Wall of China is a famous landmark in Asia.
Japan is a country in Asia famous for its technology, anime, and cherry blossoms.
Asia is the largest continent and is home to many ancient civilizations.
There is certainly no shortage of resentment in the rest of Asia about the way China throws its weight about these days.
words.defineEn: the largest continent in the world
words.defineVi: lục địa lớn nhất thế giới

examples: Asian cultures have a rich heritage of art, music, and dance.
Asian landscapes range from breathtaking mountains to stunning beaches.
Asian countries like China, Japan, and South Korea are known for their advancements in technology.
I've never tried Asian pears before.
In many Asian countries, winter melon is a staple ingredient in traditional dishes.
words.defineEn: related to Asia or its people or culture
words.defineVi: liên quan đến châu Á hoặc con người hoặc văn hóa của nó

examples: The car company has lost ground in Europe amid supply bottlenecks.
The invasion took Europe to the brink of war.
Europe is home to famous landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Colosseum, and Big Ben.
Europe is home to some of the world's oldest universities and prestigious educational institutions.
Many tourists visit Europe to experience its vibrant nightlife and entertainment.
words.defineEn: the second smallest continent‌, next to Asia in the east, the Atlantic Ocean in the west, and the Mediterranean Sea in the south
words.defineVi: lục địa‌ nhỏ thứ hai, bên cạnh châu Á ở phía đông, Đại Tây Dương ở phía tây và Biển Địa Trung Hải ở phía nam

examples: European architecture is known for its stunning cathedrals and castles.
Foreign car manufacturers have made inroads into the European market.
With the signing of the treaty, a powerful new European alliance first saw the light of day.
The course gives you a bird's eye view of European art history.
The Japanese company is light years ahead of its European competitors.
words.defineEn: related to Europe or its people
words.defineVi: liên quan đến châu Âu hoặc người dân của nó

examples: These flowers are found only in Africa.
Africa is the second-largest continent in the world.
Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest peak in Africa.
She wrote of her life in Africa.
The Maasai tribe is one of the indigenous tribes of Africa.
African clothing is known for its vibrant patterns and intricate designs.
African literature is rich with stories that reflect the continent's history and culture.
The African landscape is diverse, ranging from lush rainforests to vast deserts.
Nelson Mandela was a well-respected African leader who fought for equality.
We watched a documentary that highlighted the rich history of African civilizations.
words.defineEn: related to Africa, its people, or culture
words.defineVi: liên quan đến Châu Phi, con người hoặc văn hóa của nó
